verses.verse: Hear, <S%H8085><s%> you children, <S%H1121><s%> the instruction <S%H4148><s%> of a father, <S%H1><s%> and attend <S%H7181><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> understanding. <S%H998><s%>
For I give <S%H5414><s%> you good <S%H2896><s%> doctrine, <S%H3948><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> you not my law. <S%H8451><s%>
For I was my father's <S%H1><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> tender and only <S%H3173><s%> beloved in the sight <S%H6440><s%> of my mother. <S%H517><s%>

He taught <S%H3384><s%> me also, and said <S%H559><s%> to me, Let your heart <S%H3820><s%> retain <S%H8551><s%> my words: <S%H1697><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and live. <S%H2421><s%>

Get <S%H7069><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> get <S%H7069><s%> understanding: <S%H998><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> it not; neither <S%H408><s%> decline <S%H5186><s%> from the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Forsake <S%H5800><s%> her not, and she shall preserve <S%H8104><s%> you: love <S%H157><s%> her, and she shall keep <S%H5341><s%> you.

Wisdom <S%H2451><s%> is the principal <S%H7225><s%> thing; therefore get <S%H7069><s%> wisdom: <S%H2451><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your getting <S%H7069><s%> get <S%H7069><s%> understanding. <S%H998><s%>
Exalt <S%H5549><s%> her, and she shall promote <S%H7311><s%> you: she shall bring <S%H3513><s%> you to honor, <S%H3513><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> you do embrace <S%H2263><s%> her.
She shall give <S%H5414><s%> to your head <S%H7218><s%> an ornament <S%H3880><s%> of grace: <S%H2580><s%> a crown <S%H5850><s%> of glory <S%H8597><s%> shall she deliver <S%H4042><s%> to you.
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O my son, <S%H1121><s%> and receive <S%H3947><s%> my sayings; <S%H561><s%> and the years <S%H8141><s%> of your life <S%H2416><s%> shall be many. <S%H7235><s%>
I have taught <S%H3384><s%> you in the way <S%H1870><s%> of wisdom; <S%H2451><s%> I have led <S%H1869><s%> you in right <S%H3476><s%> paths. <S%H4570><s%>
When you go, <S%H3212><s%> your steps <S%H6806><s%> shall not be straitened; <S%H3334><s%> and when <S%H518><s%> you run, <S%H7323><s%> you shall not stumble. <S%H3782><s%>
Take <S%H2388><s%> fast hold <S%H2388><s%> of instruction; <S%H4148><s%> let her not go: <S%H7503><s%> keep <S%H5341><s%> her; for she is your life. <S%H2416><s%>
Enter <S%H935><s%> not into the path <S%H734><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> and go <S%H833><s%> not in the way <S%H1870><s%> of evil <S%H7451><s%> men.
Avoid <S%H6544><s%> it, pass <S%H5674><s%> not by it, turn <S%H7847><s%> from it, and pass <S%H5674><s%> away.

For they sleep <S%H3462><s%> not, except <S%H3808><s%> they have done mischief; <S%H7489><s%> and their sleep <S%H8142><s%> is taken <S%H1497><s%> away, <S%H1497><s%> unless <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> they cause some to fall. <S%H3782><s%>
For they eat <S%H3898><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of wickedness, <S%H7562><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> the wine <S%H3196><s%> of violence. <S%H2555><s%>

But the path <S%H734><s%> of the just <S%H6662><s%> is as the shining <S%H5051><s%> light, <S%H216><s%> that shines <S%H215><s%> more <S%H1980><s%> and more <S%H1980><s%> to the perfect <S%H3559><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
The way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> is as darkness: <S%H653><s%> they know <S%H3045><s%> not at what <S%H4100><s%> they stumble. <S%H3782><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> attend <S%H7181><s%> to my words; <S%H1697><s%> incline <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> to my sayings. <S%H561><s%>
Let them not depart <S%H3868><s%> from your eyes; <S%H5869><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> them in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of your heart. <S%H3824><s%>
For they are life <S%H2416><s%> to those that find <S%H4672><s%> them, and health <S%H4832><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> their flesh. <S%H1320><s%>
Keep <S%H5341><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> diligence; <S%H4929><s%> for out of it are the issues <S%H8444><s%> of life. <S%H2416><s%>
Put <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> from you a fraudulent <S%H6143><s%> mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and perverse <S%H3891><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> put <S%H7368><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from you.
Let your eyes <S%H5869><s%> look <S%H5027><s%> right <S%H5227><s%> on, and let your eyelids <S%H6079><s%> look straight <S%H3474><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> you.
Ponder <S%H6424><s%> the path <S%H4570><s%> of your feet, <S%H7272><s%> and let all <S%H3605><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%> be established. <S%H3559><s%>
Turn <S%H5186><s%> not to the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3227><s%> nor to the left: <S%H8040><s%> remove <S%H5493><s%> your foot <S%H7272><s%> from evil. <S%H7451><s%>
